item.title: 📷 Need work? Cash Cow Videos? Total Cost Per Video? - Upwork
item.description:
To Apply: Quote me how much you will charge me PER VIDEO, for everything.  

You can leverage as many AI tools as you need to like: Pictory, Eleven Labs, Gamma AI, whatever you need to use.

Looking for someone that can make videos for my youtube channel here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOB-5jnfDH24_pHVawul57g

looking for someone that will give me a total cost PER video.

That means everything, scriptwriting, thumbnail etc...
and a humanized voice over using eleven labs or a similar tool that passes the youtube monetization standards.

Please tell me how much you will charge me for each 10 minute video. TOTAL.  Total price.

I will not consider anything else except for a clear total price.

I'm really looking for someone that's hungry to get experience and knows they can do that, and will be happy with getting paid PER VIDEO and doing it all.

I'm not trying to waste anyone's time, so please do not reply if you do not give me a total per video based on the youtube channel I am showing you.

Thank you very much.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 06:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Subtitles, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Subtitles, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: I Need A Video Editor Who Works In CapCut - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone to work in my agency full-time for 12 days for $250.

The job primarily involves video editing (12 reels need to be edited), along with some posting and other small tasks, which will all be explained.

I need a person who is experienced in CapCut.

Message me if you're interested.

item.title: Looking For YOUTUBE AUTOMATION AGENCY - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,

We are an international team looking for an experienced YouTube Agency to test a new channel. What are we looking for?

- Experience with YouTube
- You know how to do research and find original clips
- Know how to work with original NEWS related ITEMS!
- 5+ year experience with YouTube
- Plagiarism-free content AND footage (will be checked!)
- Know how thumbnails work and is able to deliver quality
- Long-term commitment

Agency need:

- Script witer
- Voice Over (NO AI!)
- Video Editor
- Thumbnail designer

We will start with 4-5 min videos to test the niche. If positive, we are ready to scale to long-form content on a daily basis. Clear instructions will be given when we start working together.

Please share your portfolio with me and your prices.
Budget will be around 250 dollars for 10 videos.
Prices are negotiable for EXCELLENT QUALITY !!



Budget: $250
Posted On: June 30, 2024 05:25 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Photoshop, Video Production, Content Writing
Skills: Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Photoshop, Video Production, Content Writing
Country: Belgium
click to apply

item.title: Content Video Creator for Window Tint Business and YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented Content Video Creator to produce engaging videos for our Window Tint Business and YouTube channel. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of video production, storytelling, and editing techniques. You will be responsible for creating high-quality videos that showcase our products and services, as well as educate and entertain our target audience.

    Responsibilities:
    - Collaborate with our marketing team to identify video content needs
    - Develop creative concepts and storyboards for each video project
    - Shoot, edit, and produce professional-quality videos
    - Incorporate visual effects, graphics, and sound elements to enhance the videos
    - Optimize videos for various social media platforms

    Requirements:
    - Proven experience in video production and editing
    - Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
    - Strong storytelling and creative skills
    - Knowledge of videography techniques and equipment
    - Understanding of social media platforms and video optimization
    - Excellent communication and teamwork skills

    This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level video creator who can bring fresh ideas and creativity to our brand. If you are passionate about creating engaging video content and have a strong portfolio showcasing your skills, we would love to hear from you!

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 30, 2024 05:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Photoshop
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Kids craft videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are on the lookout for an expert in arts & crafts video production for kids - everything from "how to draw a dog", to "playdough recipes",

These videos will need to be adjusted into different formats, as we intent to:

1. Share on Pinterest
2. Share on Facebook
3. Share on website
4. Share on YouTube
5. Share on TikTok

We are looking to put a few creators on a trial - and then are looking to make a full time hire.

Please note, these videos MUST be original and we cannot simply recut other channels video content for legal reasons. So we will need proof these are original.

No materials will be provided for this, so the creator will need to have access to all materials and have the ability to carry out the craft.

Please apply with the following:

1. Details on past experience in this space
2. Examples of videos you have created
3. Your rate per video (and rate per batch of 10 videos/if you have any kind of bulk discount)
4. Your availability to start
5. Details on software you will use
6. An example of 5 different craft videos we could create for kids

Please note - we will only respond to applicants that fully comply with the above.

Looking forward to hearing from you all!


Posted On: June 30, 2024 05:17 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:YouTube Video, TikTok Video, Video Production, Video Editing, Videography
Skills: YouTube Video, TikTok Video, Video Production, Video Editing, Videography
Country: Australia
click to apply
